video_title: How to use the Symbol tool in Illustrator

video_steps.step1: 1. Open Illustrator document with bare tree and leaf objects on the canvas
video_steps.step2: 2. Shrink the leaf down so it fits the tree
video_steps.step4: 4. Select leaf from canvas and drag to symbols palette
video_steps.step6: 6. Drag leaf from symbols palette onto tree
video_steps.step7: 7. Drag symbol tools panel onto canvas
video_steps.step9: 9. Click and drag to put leaves all over tree
video_steps.step11: 11. Click and drag to bring leaves closer together
video_steps.step13: 13. Click and drag to scrunch leaves
video_steps.step15: 15. Click and drag to resize leaves
video_steps.step17: 17. Click and drag the leaves to spin them
video_steps.step21: 21. Click and drag around leaves to change their color
video_steps.step23: 23. Click and drag leaves to change their opacity
video_steps.step27: 27. Click and drag leaves to change their style
